withdrawFrom(address,uint256).intent: Unwrap WNAT from another user into native tokens

delegate(address,uint256).intent: Delegate all governance vote power to address

votePowerOfAt(address,uint256).intent: Get the governance vote power of an address at block number

batchDelegate(address[],uint256[]).intent: Delegate governance to list of Delegatees

balanceOf(address).intent: Check the amount of tokens an account owns

allowance(address,address).intent: Show how many tokens a spender is still allowed to use from the owner's account

approve(address,uint256).intent: Let someone spend a set amount of your tokens
